attributes.action: Award Mike Dowden, Firefighter, recognition for his role at Grenfell Tower.
attributes.background: It is clear from the television reports of the Inquiry that Mike Dowden was put under immense stress by having to publicly relive an hour of his life that will haunt him forever. We want him and his colleagues to know that we are thankful for what they do and in no way hold them responsible.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
